items.question: How does ReplyStack work?
items.answer: ReplyStack uses AI to generate personalized responses to your customer reviews. Install our browser extension, configure your response profile (tone, style, industry), and click the 'Reply with AI' button on any review platform.

items.question: Which platforms does ReplyStack work on?
items.answer: ReplyStack works on all major review platforms: Google Business, TripAdvisor, Booking.com, Yelp, Facebook, Trustpilot, and many more. Our extension automatically detects review pages.

items.question: Can I customize the generated responses?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can configure your response profile with your preferred tone (professional, warm, casual), your industry, and custom instructions. Each response is also editable before publishing.

items.question: Does the free plan have limitations?
items.answer: The free plan gives you access to all features with 15 responses per month. No watermark, no blocked features. You can upgrade anytime for more responses.

items.question: How do I install the extension?
items.answer: Go to the Chrome Web Store or Firefox Add-ons, search for 'ReplyStack' and click 'Add'. The extension installs in 30 seconds and guides you through profile setup.
